title: SMC_GSentenceJumpBuffer (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GSentenceJumpBuffer
This function block buffers g-code sentences in order to avoid
a full restart of the g-code file on jumps (G20).
It must be used before the
SMC_NCNavigator
function block.
Note: this function block is part of
SMC_ReadNCFile2
, so it is not
necessary to instantiate it by hand.

rows.Name: bExecute
rows.Comment: WhileTRUE, the function block is active.

rows:
IfTRUE, the current processing of this function block
is aborted

rows.Name: bBusy
rows.Comment: TRUEwhile execution of function block is not finished.

rows:
TRUEsignals that an error has occurred within
the function block.
The source-position where an error has been detected.

The number of jump targets found in the buffer.
Reset at rising edge of bExecute.

The number of jump targets not found in the buffer.
Reset at rising edge of bExecute.
